thread.title: Today Only: A "Big Thanks" Money Saving Deal from Amazon
thread.title_full: Today Only: A "Big Thanks" Money Saving Deal from Amazon

author: Apartment Therapy
title: Today Only: A "Big Thanks" Money Saving Deal from Amazon
text:
Share 
Have a few things hanging out in your cart at Amazon ? Need to pick up some gifts, goodies or possibly even some groceries? Well, Amazon is celebrating their #1 rank in a reputation ranking poll, with a record high score of 86.27, by offering shoppers $8.63 off their $50 or more purchases today. 
Just use the code "BIG THANKS" at checkout to have the discount applied to your order. Offer does not apply to digital content, video games, or Amazon Gift Cards, but, other gift cards are included, so buying one for a grocery store or restaurant allows you to spread the essentially "free money" around if you wish. 
Some suggestions for how to hit the $50 threshold for your discount:
